item.title: On Getting Started
item.description: Why write with Hugo? focusing on the writing having lots of things pre-configured easy and fast to deploy sequenceDiagram participant Alice participant Bob Alice->>John: Hello John, how are you? loop Healthcheck John->>John: Fight against hypochondria end Note right of John: Rational thoughts prevail! John-->>Alice: Great! John->>Bob: How about you? Bob-->>John: Jolly good!
